title: [Large-scale] Motivation and Cognitive Load Management Strategies for Remote Math Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational secondary-level mathematics knowledge and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Implementation of project-based assessments utilizing animations/interactive videos in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain mathematical concepts by over 80% through animated videos.
Strategies can be applied to reduce extraneous cognitive load by 30% when using interactive videos.
Records a self-assessment of an average of 4 points or higher (on a 5-point scale) on 12 or more items of the Instructional Materials Motivation Survey (IMMS-SU)
Achieves a project completion rate of 90% or higher relative to video learning time in a blended learning environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
